Emergency Rental Assistance Program (ERAP)

July 13, 2020 Editor 0

The Emergency Rental Assistance Program (ERAP) provides a one-time benefit to assist with one month’s rent to Miami-Dade County low and moderate income households experiencing financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

Education Slider News 

Miami-Dade County School Board Names New K-8 and High School in Doral

June 22, 2020 Editor 0

The Miami-Dade County School Board approved the naming of two new schools in Doral. The K-8 center will be named after Ms. Andrea Castillo, teacher and the late daughter of School Board Member, Susie Castillo. The high school will be named after Mayor Juan Carlos Bermudez, founding and current Mayor of the City of Doral.
